name: IneptHacker
description:
Inept Hacker is about hacking a random code in the fastest possible time.

Game Play:

Spam the letters of your keyboard to find the random 10 character code. The screen will switch between black and white whenever you correctly type a letter. At the end you will receive your hacking time.

Download available below for none browser and chrome users. Extract files and run the .exe file.

Made for bit jam 2016.
